item.title: Windows VM and Hyper-V (nested virtualization)
item.author: felix.niederwanger@suse.de (phoenix)
item.description: In this encore to the Run Azure images in Hyper-V or kvm will briefly discuss, if it is possible to create your own Hyper-V Windows Hypervisor as a kvm guest on Linux.
